title: Apple carrot bran muffins
ingredients: ['75g wheat bran', '4 tablespoons oat bran', '125g plain flour', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '70g sultanas', '5 tablespoons mixed seeds and/or chopped nuts', '1 medium carrot, grated', '1 large apple, grated (with peel)', '5 tablespoons light margarine spread', '1 egg, beaten', '350ml skimmed milk']
